snippet: Manager Terry Collins said Thursday that while he and his players were unhappy with their record, their win total should not dictate the sense of the team’s direction and overall progress.
abstract: Manager Terry Collins said Thursday that while he and his players were unhappy with their record, their win total should not dictate the sense of the team’s direction and overall progress.

headline.main: Undeterred by Losing, Collins Stays Focused on Big Picture
